Articles.Content: So today I went to the petameter which incase you didnt know is a LONG way out there. Some players have seen the altitude represented with a letter "G" less have seen "T" and very few (if any) have seen "P". That being said Petameter is farther out then "T" (trillion I think) one Petameter is 10^15 or 1,000,000,000,000,000 or a quadrillion meters. So as you can tell thats a little ways out there. For this voyage I am only going to use interstellar mod and Kerbal alarm clock (running in the back ground) and lastly hyperedit, however I am ONLY using hyper edit to get me to 150 kilometers above Kerbin, after that it is no longer used. I will update this whenever I hit a big mile stone, also because they keep getting farther and farther away this causes me to build a larger ship each time, for example I am going to have to build maybe twice as big as this ship to get the next letter, I have no idea what it is by the way. So wish me luck and I hope you enjoy!! to the petameter

You've reached 1000 petameters, fyi. Or 1 exameter

Cheers
Tell the space kraken that we miss he/her so much...
Just met her on Duna of all places...
